explanation: No additional symbols are required. The static call graph shows lfs_dir_needsrelocation has an empty callees list (it does not call any functions). MISRA recursion checking requires examining the callee graph starting from the target to see if there is any path back to itself; because the target has no callees, there can be no direct or indirect self-call. Inspecting its callers is unnecessary for this check (a caller calling the target does not make the target recursively call itself unless the target calls that caller, which it does not).
